subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Landon Donovan has not played for the national team since last summer and was passed over by Coach Jurgen Klinsmann after Donovan took a sabbatical from soccer.
snippet: Landon Donovan has not played for the national team since last summer and was passed over by Coach Jurgen Klinsmann after Donovan took a sabbatical from soccer.
